state: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
division: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu Transport Department
description: DD-01 is the primary Regional Transport Office for the Dadra and Nagar Haveli district, headquartered in Silvassa. It was officially designated in 2020 following the merger of the UTs of Daman and Diu and Dadra and Nagar Haveli, replacing the old DN-09 code for new registrations.
address: Transport Bhavan, Athal Junction, Silvassa, Dadra and Nagar Haveli

state: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
description: DD-02 is the Regional Transport Office for the Diu district following the 2020 merger of the Union Territories. It is responsible for vehicle registrations, issuing driving licenses, and enforcing motor vehicle regulations within the island district of Diu.
address: Motor Vehicle Section, Collectorate Office, Diu, Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu

state: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
description: DD-03 is the designated Regional Transport Office for the Daman district within the Union Territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu. Following the 2020 administrative merger, this office manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport permits for the entire Daman enclave.
address: RTO Complex, Airport Road, Nani Daman, Daman, Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
